name: Commemoration of Erik Josias Sparre
obverse_inscriptions: GREFVE ERIK JOSIAS SPARRE LANDSHÖFDING I ELFSBORGS LÄN.
reverse: A man is sowing seeds. In the background is a man plowing behind oxen.
reverse_inscriptions: AKTNINGSGÄRD AF ELFSBORGS LÄNS K. HUSHALLNINGSSÄLLSKAPS MEDLEMMAR 1883.
description: Erik Josias Sparre (1816-1886) was the governor of Älvsborg County and well-respected for his leadership.
